text: Following the massive success of her third, ready - to - wear collaboration with designer Tommy Hilfiger, Gigi Hadid is trying on a new hat for size. Last night on Instagram, the model of the moment teased her loyal fan base of 36 million followers and counting with the announcement of her very own makeup line with Maybelline. Beauty junkies everywhere went wild. Loading View on Instagram “ A year in the making... ” captioned the image, which found the model, clad in faux - shearling and leaning over a drool - worthy table of brushes, concealers and lipsticks, ranging in shades of nude, light pink and deep berry purple.
